Judul: WASTE MANAGEMENT COMMUNITY CENTER FOR HEALTHIER URBAN LIVING AND ENVIRONMENT AWARENESS
Abstrak:
Cities in Indonesia produce thousands of tons of waste each day (Statistics
Indonesia—BPS, 2019). There is waste management system for each region.
Besides that, the citizens should also contribute. By observing behavior and
awareness of waste of the citizens, literature study, and waste management in the
country and the foreign ones study, this research aims for finding solution through
an interior design of a waste management facility. This should be a step to change
people’s lifestyle through spatial approach; a community center anyone could
access for information about waste management and production through waste
treatments, information center, and workshops
